message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $105.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make a slightly more competitive offer. I can sell it to you for $102.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think we can do better than that. I'm willing to pay $98
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my previous offer. I can sell it to you for $101.
I'm getting close to the price I'm comfortable with, but I'd like to make one last offer. I'm willing to pay $97
I understand you're close to the price you're comfortable with, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to try to meet you in the middle. I can sell it to you for $99.
I'm willing to meet you at $98, that's the lowest I'm willing to go. If you can meet me there, I'll buy the product from you
